attributes.action: Ask at least 2 of his friends to listen to JACK fm Oxfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So here's the deal, on the day we're told the breakfast show (JACK's Morning Glory) doesn't have enough listeners & there's a high chance of us getting ditched, we win a New York Radio Festival Comedy Award (This is in addition to all the Sonys and Arqiva awards).

However, not even that's enough to save us.

So on the off chance the Prime Minister's one of the supposed few that listen to our show - We'd be really grateful if he could ask a few of his mates to listen.

Tell them it's fun, it's local, it's interactive and it doesn't talk about tabloid s***.

We're asking everyone to tell 2 friends to turn us on and save JACK fm.

We'd be really grateful if Gordon would get behind us on this one, in spite of any bad feelings he may after our last encounter.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
